title: Laura Kuenssberg: end of year
description: Rishi Sunak's hoped for turnaround didn't happen. Despite several restarts, refreshes, reboots, promises of the 'real Rishi' coming out, the prime minister has not been able to shake his party out of the doldrums in the polls.

title: Shopper buys Christmas gifts for Rishi Sunak's daughters during PM's visit to Teesside
description: Stockton MP Matt Vickers said the gifting happened while the Prime Minister was in Yarm meeting with members of the community on Friday. Mr Sunak visited Strickland and Holt Coffee Shop in Yarm to take questions from business, charities and community leaders in the area.

title: Stop the votes? Just 1 in 10 Brits say Sunak ‘doing a good job’ on immigration
description: Even 1 in 10 seems high, but nevertheless, these polling figures on immigration are devastating for Rishi Sunak.

description: Rishi Sunak was in the Covid Inquiry hot seat this week, where he was grilled over his controversial ‘Eat Out to Help Out’ discount hospitality scheme. During the six hours of questioning, Sunak insisted the scheme was the ‘right thing to do,’ while arguing his ‘Dr Death’ nickname was not justified.

title: Rishi Sunak called in as 'Walleys Quarry smells now stretch as far as two miles'
description: A council leader has vowed to raise the handling of Walleys Quarry with the Prime Minister - after a recent surge in complaints about foul odours. Simon Tagg is continuing to call for a public inquiry after it emerged hydrogen sulphide emissions had been under-recorded around the Silverdale landfill site.

title: Stormont: DUP officers meet to consider Stormont deal
description: A meeting of the Democratic Unionist Party's (DUP) officers took place on Friday as the party considers a potential return to Stormont.
